title: Automatically Upload Scanned Documents to Nextcloud via ScanservJS
author: Joachim Hummel

readme:
This workflow connects a USB scanner to Nextcloud via ScanservJS and the integrated API. It checks for new scans at a scheduled time (e.g., every 5 minutes). If there are any, they are automatically retrieved via HTTP request and then saved to a desired Nextcloud folder.

Ideal for home offices, offices, or maker projects with Raspberry Pi and network scanners.

![Bildschirmfoto 20250504 um 16.18.42.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Bildschirmfoto_2025_05_04_um_16_18_42_321d9f1dc6.png)

Nodes used:

  * Schedule Trigger – starts the flow cyclically

  * HTTP Request – retrieves document data from ScanservJS

  * Nextcloud Node – uploads the file directly to your Nextcloud account




Requirements:

  * Local installation of ScanservJS (e.g., on a Raspberry Pi)

  * Configured USB scanner




![Bildschirmfoto 20250504 um 16.20.46.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/Bildschirmfoto_2025_05_04_um_16_20_46_8827428bf6.png)

  * Nextcloud access with write permissions in the target folder
readme_html:
This workflow connects a USB scanner to Nextcloud via ScanservJS and the integrated API. It checks for new scans at a scheduled time (e.g., every 5 minutes). If there are any, they are automatically retrieved via HTTP request and then saved to a desired Nextcloud folder.

Ideal for home offices, offices, or maker projects with Raspberry Pi and network scanners.

Nodes used:

  • Schedule Trigger – starts the flow cyclically

  • HTTP Request – retrieves document data from ScanservJS

  • Nextcloud Node – uploads the file directly to your Nextcloud account

Requirements:

  • Local installation of ScanservJS (e.g., on a Raspberry Pi)

  • Configured USB scanner

  • Nextcloud access with write permissions in the target folder
title_zh: 自动将扫描文档上传至Nextcloud，通过ScanservJS实现
readme_zh:
该工作流程通过 ScanservJS 和集成的 API 将 USB 扫描仪连接到 Nextcloud。它会按定期时间（例如每 5 分钟）检查是否有新的扫描。如果有任何新扫描,它们会通过 HTTP 请求自动检索,然后保存到所需的 Nextcloud 文件夹。

适用于家庭办公室、办公室或带有树莓派和网络扫描仪的制作项目。

使用的节点:

* 计划触发器 – 循环启动流程
* HTTP 请求 – 从 ScanservJS 检索文档数据
* Nextcloud 节点 – 直接将文件上传到您的 Nextcloud 帐户

要求:

* 安装有 ScanservJS 的本地系统（如树莓派）
* 已配置的 USB 扫描仪
* 在目标文件夹有写权限的 Nextcloud 访问
